experience.title: Ecommerce Manager
experience.description: My primary responsibility is to build strong retail media expertise within the group. I also work closely with the central MCN eCommerce team on strategic eCommerce projects across the group.Key Responsibilities:â€¢	Amazon Activation: Implemented and executed Amazon campaigns for the Kenvue brands (Johnson Adult, Neutrogena, Listerine, OGX, Johnson Baby, Carefree, Aveeno). This involved full planning, setup, implementation, and optimization resulting in improved YOY ROAS of 60% in KSA and 50% in UAE.â€¢	Retail Media Activations: Worked closely with Carrefour, Noon, Talabat, Instashop, etc. to strategize and execute retail media campaigns for brands using on-platform media products and tools like Criteo & Citrus Ads. Achieved 100 million+ impressions and 3+ ROAS on these platforms.â€¢	Tools/Software: Proficient in Amazon Ads, Pacvue, Noon Ads, Criteo, Citrus Ads, and Helium 10.â€¢	Collaboration with Strategic Partners: Worked closely with key partners to align on the strategic direction of e-commerce activities by fostering strong relationships, leveraging partner expertise, and collaborating on joint initiatives to achieve mutual objectives.â€¢	Other Projects: Worked on other e-commerce projects like auditing and optimizing American Garden & LEGOâ€™s Amazon presence by showcasing Amazon SEO expertise.â€¢	CRO Project: Worked on multiple UX/UI and CRO projects for Central Group Thailand to improve the search conversion rate by 30% on the website.

experience.title: Sr. Ecommerce Merchandiser
experience.description: â€¢	Marketplace Management: Developed and managed the business relationship for the GCC region with pure-play marketplace teams (B2B & B2C) of Amazon, Noon, Namshi, and Ounass â€¢	Budgeting: Planned yearly budgeting and phasing to achieve sellout and sales targets.  â€¢	Procurement: Liaised with watches and accessories brands like Tommy Hilfiger, Anne Klein, Gucci, Versace, etc. to purchase the products and sell to/on marketplaces and Rivolishop.comâ€¢	Pricing: Set pricing of the products for various marketplaces and maintain healthy margins â€¢	Inventory: Differentiated the assortment and inventory plan for multiple marketplaces and brands â€¢	Promotions: Plan and execute regular and event promotions to maximize growth and sellout. Ensured marketplace participation in key events like Ramadan, White Friday, etc.â€¢	Reporting: Developed reports/dashboards and presented to the senior executive team on the performance of commerce business for both native websites and marketplaces.

experience.title: Assistant Manager - Marketing & Ecommerce
experience.description: â€¢	Marketplace Management: Administered the management of Jumbo's key marketplace accounts, which are Noon and Amazon. Responsible for 4x growth with key strategic initiativesâ€¢	Partnerships: Received recognition from senior management for outstanding contribution to online sales success, adeptly managing major events, and fostering key relationships with HP and Nvidia â€¢	Budgeting: Planned yearly budgeting for Amazon & Noon to achieve sellout and sales targets  â€¢	Pricing: Set automated pricing strategies to win Buy Box from Amazon and other retailersâ€¢	Inventory: Managed inventory for Amazon and Noon on multiple fulfillment models like FBA, FBM (Easy Ship), and Seller Flexâ€¢	Key Initiatives: Introduced Seller Flex to increase assortment on Amazon, especially for bulky and high-value items like consumer appliancesâ€¢	Strategic Partnerships: Partnered with Samsung to provide exclusive sales on Noon for select mobilesâ€¢	Promotions: Procured additional inventory for new product launches like iPhone for Amazon and Noonâ€¢	Other Projects: Managed personalization campaigns for Jumbo.ae website and email database. recommendations: Jacopo Basso â€œI am pleased to recommend Vaibhav based on his solid performance and contributions during his time as one of my direct reports. Vaibhav played a key role in developing retail media expertise within our team and demonstrated efficient project management skills by successfully handling multiple projects for key FMCG brands. He achieved notable results in retail media campaigns for platforms such as Amazon, Noon, Carrefour, and Talabat. These achievements underscore his profound understanding of e-commerce operations and media products within the regional market.â€
